title: Hunter Biden Thirst, GOPratt 10.20.20
itunes:title: Hunter Biden Thirst, GOPratt 10.20.20
description:
In episode 740, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Kyle Ayers to discuss Fox News telling Trump to stop talking about Hunter Biden, more republican politicians moving away from Trump, Nate Silver's tips to stay sane in an election, low key conservative Chris Pratt, Facebook killing traffic to left-leaning news sites, the scariest movie ever, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. ‘Fox & Friends’ Host Steve Doocy to Trump: Stop Talking About Hunter Biden
  2. Trump tells campaign staffers to ignore reports about race: 'We're going to win'
  3. Trump ‘kisses dictators’ butts,’ Senator Ben Sasse, a Republican, tells constituents.
  4. GOP’s Sen. Sasse says Trump mistreats women, flirts with white supremacy and secretly mocks evangelicals
  5. 8 Tips To Stay Sane In The Final 15 Days Of The Campaign
  6. ‘Avengers’ Cast Assembles for Joe Biden Fundraiser
  7. Facebook reportedly choked traffic for left-leaning news sites including Mother Jones
  8. What Is The Scariest Movie Ever? Science Now Has An Answer To That Question
  9. Kyle Ayers - Happiness (Album)
  10. WATCH: Headie One - Parlez-Vous Anglais (Official Video) ft. Aitch

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
